alert.note: Alert for Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 22 at 4:24PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of San Bernardino and Riverside Counties through 515 PM PST... At 423 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Beaumont, or 10 miles south of Yucaipa, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Moreno Valley, Hwy 243 Between Banning And Idyllwild, Mt San Jacinto State Park, Beaumont, Banning, Cabazon, Calimesa, Cherry Valley, Morongo Indian Reservation, and Lakeview. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning
